document_data.mainbody:
anticores Tail was an enchanted spear that belonged to Raika a Reghedmen barbarian adventurer active in the late 15 century DR.
Manticores Tail was a large polearm wielded with two hands. Its severe-looking metallic speartip was shaped like two triangles perched one atop the other.
thumb|Raika, wielding the Manticores Tail.
The magic spear was enchanted to sap life energy out of its targets and transferring its lions share back to the wielder.
*Raika a half-orc barbarian who worked with other warriors of Waterdeep, performing missions on behalf of Laeral Silverhand in the late 15 century DR.
